entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with rain this morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023
